page.title: 03Ythanwells School
page.content: At Ythanwells School there are only ten pupils and one full-time teacher, Mrs Symon, who teaches maths,English, writing, environmental studies and crafts.We have three peripatetic teachers for physical education, drama and music.Once a week we go to Huntly for swimming. The school has three big rooms. We use one as a classroom with tables put together, a computer,piano and T.V.,and a library corner full of books.The second room is used for P.E. and dining and in the third room a stage can be put up for concerts held by the pupils.Outside is a small foot- ball field and grass to play on. The school lunches are cooked at Drumblade and brought by car.We spend 7 years at Ythanwells Primary School, and then transfer to the Gordon Schools, Huntly.
